[Added entry of Ch'eje chŏnhwan'guk ŭi sijang kyŏngje kyoyuk kyŏnghŏm i Pukhan e chunŭn sisachŏm]
Cho, Myŏng-ch'ŏl. Ch'eje chŏnhwan'guk ŭi sijang kyŏngje kyoyuk kyŏnghŏm i Pukhan e chunŭn sisachŏm, 2008:

t.p. (Kim Chi-yŏn = 김 지연) colophon, etc. (M.S. social work, Univ. of Texas at Austin; researcher, Taeeo Kyŏngje Chŏngch'aek Yŏn'guwŏn Kukche Kaebal Hyŏmnyŏk Sent'ŏ T'ongil Kukche Hyŏmnyŏkt'im; Jiyeon Kim [in rom.])
